name: part_000
file: tmp_【#つながるホロライブDAY2】hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish【チラ見せ】 [LgyXzn0k0MA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening 'Attention' slide displaying event rules for visitors.
Showcase of hololive SUPER EXPO 2022 official merchandise including cards, acrylic stands, and binders.
Second 'Attention' slide with health and safety guidelines (masks, mobile app, and recording rules).
Repeat of the first 'Attention' slide with event participation rules.
Main visual for hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish Day 2 with official hashtag.
Extended merchandise showcase featuring penlights, apparel, and various collectibles.

subtitles.original:
公演中に声を出しての応援はご遠慮ください
ライト・拍手で応援をお願いします
subtitles.english:
Please refrain from vocal cheering during the performance.
Please support with lights and applause.

subtitles.original: 公演中は自席の前で立ってご観覧いただけます
subtitles.english: You may stand in front of your seat during the show.

subtitles.original: 公演中は席の移動をお控えください
subtitles.english: Please refrain from moving from your seat during the show.

subtitles.original: マスクの着用にご協力ください
subtitles.english: Please cooperate by wearing a mask.

subtitles.original:
COCOAを使用していだくため携帯電話の電源はオフにせず
マナーモードに設定してください
subtitles.english:
To allow for COCOA app usage, please do not turn off
your phone; instead, set it to silent mode.

subtitles.original: 撮影/録音/録画は禁止とさせていただきます
subtitles.english: Photography, audio recording, and filming are prohibited.
